title: I want to start blogging, what is your advice for me? - Blogging And Marketing - Quora

response.answer_text: Starting a career in blogging is good idea. Give your 100% when you will write,it should be unique ,interesting and helpful for your readers. Focus on the niche what you are writing about don’t get distracted . Patience is very essential when you starting a blog , it will take some time for the approval of google adsence . Don’t lose hope , show your skills to other people . keep observing your competitors ,like how they are getting too much traffic ? why people are liking their blogs ? . learn something from your competitors and then write your article in your own way. If you are choosing a micro niche topic for your blogging, that is also good. The thing you need to understand is ‘’Good things take time ‘’. If you want to become a great writer in future then just don’t run after money or focus only on money ,make your content so beautiful which will make people run after you. Have a good day !!

My advice is that you are someone who is honest to your readers, that you don’t just copy any content or use softwares which are generating content, that you publish a new post at least once per week and that you are writing helpful articles.
